title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: EMI - Interference Problem Terminology. Typical noise path Application of network theory - Methods of elimination. Noise sources , Passive components, Capacities, Inductors, Resistors, Transformers active devices, Transistors, FETS, ICs - Intrinsic noise sources. Noise Elimination - Shielding - E.S. shielding, EM shielding, Calculations Shielded conductors. Grounding and Bonding - Safety ground - Signal ground - Single point grounding - Multipoint grounding - Hardware grounding - Grounding of shields. Additional Noise Reduction Techniques - Balancing - Power supply decoupling Isolation - Filters. Shielding Effectiveness - Absorption - Reflection - Seams - Holes Gaskets. Contact Protection - Inductive Loads - Resistive Loads. Principles of Electromagnetic Compatibility.
